org.jgum.strategy

Class ReflectiveEvaluator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jgum.strategy.ReflectiveEvaluator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.common.base.Function

    public class ReflectiveEvaluator
extends Object
implements com.google.common.base.Function
    A reflective evaluator that makes use of a given method and its arguments to delegate to a processing object in a responsibility chain.
    Author:
    sergioc
